task.title: How to Configure an IBM DB2 Connection

taskbody.prereq: The support to create an IBM DB2 connection is available in the Enterprise edition only.
taskbody.context: To configure a connection to an IBM DB2 server, follow these steps:

step.cmd: In the Connections panel, click the New button.

stepresult.p: The dialog for configuring a database connection will be displayed.

step.cmd: Enter a unique name for the connection.
Select an IBM DB2 data sources in the Data Source combo box.

substep.cmd: Fill-in the URL to the installed IBM DB2 engine.
Fill-in the user name to access the IBM DB2 engine.
Fill-in the password to access the IBM DB2 engine.

step.cmd: Click the OK button to finish the configuration of the database connection.

taskbody.result: To watch our video demonstration about running XQuery against an IBM DB2 Pure XML database, go to http://www.oxygenxml.com/demo/DB2.html.
